title: Main Help
description: This is the main help page for Geo-Bot. Listed below are the different modules and commands within them. You may either do `--help [module]` or `--help [command]` to find more information on commands within a grouping or specifications on a command and it's syntax.

fields.name: Reminders
fields.value:
`remind me
remind here
remind list
remind delete`

fields.name: Logging
fields.value:
`log
log all
log info
log add/enable
log remove/disable`

title: Prune/Purge
description: This command requires the user to have `manageMessages` permission.

fields.name: prune #
fields.value:
Run this command to delete messages in bulk. Please note due to discord limitations you cannot delete messages older than 14 days with this command.
Example: `--prune 50` will delete the last 50 messages

fields.name: prune (@user or User ID) #
fields.value:
This command will delete only messages sent by the provided user mention or ID within the last 250 messages in the channel.
Example: `--prune @Mj11jM#1111 50` will delete the last 50 messages sent by @Mj11jM within the last 250 total messages.
